projects.name: AlumniHub
projects.description: A centralized alumni platform with career guidance, multilingual support, course recommendations, and interactive student-alumni features.

projects.name: FinWise
projects.description: A financial management platform offering budgeting tools, savings tracking, debt management, personalized recommendations, and community-driven financial education.

projects.name: Chit-Chat
projects.description: A real-time chat application featuring user following, messaging, and plans for video calling functionality.

projects.name: N.Shop
projects.description: An e-commerce website with third-party payment gateway integration, product filtering, UPI-based checkout, and a seamless online shopping experience.
